price: 故安拉将为他们防御那日的灾难，并赏赐他们光华和快乐。
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhumu al-lahu sharra dhālika al-yawmi walaqqāhum naḍratan wasurūran
translations: and will cause them to meet
